whirl 0.0.0.9001
  • Reference

    Whirl R session

    whirl_r_session.Rd

    Extension of callr::r_session with additional methods for easier creating logs.

    Super classes

    processx::process -> callr::r_session -> whirl_r_session

    Method new()

    Initialize the new whirl R session

    Usage

    whirl_r_session$new(
  verbose = TRUE,
  check_renv = FALSE,
  track_files = FALSE,
  track_files_discards = c(),
  track_files_keep = c(),
  approved_pkgs_folder = c(),
  approved_pkgs_url = c()
)

    Arguments

    verbose

    logical Should the progress be printed to the console?

    check_renv

    logical Should renv be checked?

    track_files

    logical Should the files be tracked?

    track_files_discards

    character Files to discard from tracking

    track_files_keep

    character Files to keep from tracking

    approved_pkgs_folder

    character Folder with approved packages

    approved_pkgs_url

    character URL with approved packages

    Returns

    A whirl_r_session object

    Method finalize()

    Finalize the whirl R session

    Usage

    whirl_r_session$finalize()

    Method print()

    Print the whirl R session

    Usage

    whirl_r_session$print()

    Returns

    invisible self

    Method poll()

    Poll the process

    Usage

    whirl_r_session$poll(timeout)

    Arguments

    timeout

    The timeout in milliseconds

    Returns

    invisible self

    Method wait()

    Wait for the process to complete

    Usage

    whirl_r_session$wait(timeout = -1)

    Arguments

    timeout

    The timeout in milliseconds

    Returns

    invisible self

    Method check_status()

    Check the status of the callr process

    whirl_r_session$check_status()

    Method log_finish()

    Finish the log

    Usage

    whirl_r_session$log_finish()

    Returns

    Method create_outputs()

    Create all log outputs

    Usage

    whirl_r_session$create_outputs(out_dir, format)

    Arguments

    out_dir

    character Output directory for the log

    format

    character Output formats to create

    Returns

    invisible,list of logging information

    Method clone()

    The objects of this class are cloneable with this method.

    Usage

    whirl_r_session$clone(deep = FALSE)

    Arguments

    deep

    Whether to make a deep clone.
